mapper.select: select po.order_id as `주문ID`, c.cust_id `고객ID`, date_format(po.order_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as `주문일`, sum(pm.menu_price * oi.count) as `소계` from customer c join pizza_order po on po.cust_id = c.cust_id join order_item oi on oi.order_id = po.order_id join pizza_menu pm on pm.menu_id = oi.menu_id where c.cust_name = #{cust_name} group by 주문일 order by 주문일 desc;
